mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (id, username, nickname, password, avatar, phone, email, status) VALUES (#{param.id}, #{param.username}, #{param.nickname}, #{param.password}, #{param.avatar}, #{param.phone}, #{param.email}, #{param.status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_user
username = #{param.username},
nickname = #{param.nickname},
avatar = #{param.avatar},
phone = #{param.phone},
email = #{param.email},
avatar = #{param.avatar},
`status` = #{param.status},
WHERE id = #{param.id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, nickname, password, avatar, phone, email, status, create_time, update_time FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}

SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu sm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id WHERE su.id = #{id} AND sm.perms IS NOT NULL

SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.component AS path, sm.icon, sm.menu_name AS name, sm.order_num, sm.status AS hideInMenu FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu sm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id WHERE su.id = #{id} AND sm.menu_type != 'F'
